SEARCH
Package wordle

Interface WordleGameplayController

All Known Implementing Classes:
WordleGameplayControllerEasy, WordleGameplayControllerHard, WordleGameplayControllerMedium
public interface WordleGameplayController
Interface for the gameplay controller in the Wordle game. Defines the essential methods required for setting up and managing the gameplay. This includes setting player information, the game level, and the word to be guessed.
